channel.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
channel.description: I know that original RS doesn't have an actual storyline throughout it, but I do find it quite odd that not a single server has been created with a storyline (as far as I know). Why do you think this is?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

i have realised this… its better as a minigame, becuz then the game is bascally not multiplayer, ubmight as well make it a offline game

Read full topic
item.source: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:24, topic:524435”]The reason why nobody has a storyline in a RuneScape private server is for a few different reasons. There’s reasons like lores, sub-quests, etc. already in the game. Another reason is because nobody wants to put that much depth in a private server that will most likely not get even remotely popular. Anyone that is capable of adding a proper storyline that has enough depth in it aren’t interested in RuneScape emulation at all. It would take a very long time to make a decent storyline that most people wouldn’t even bother playing through.

I believe that it would be pointless to try and add a storyline to a private server of any kind unless the MMO itself already has one.[/quote]

I agree with this why add a storyline then booom 4 months later Jagex tells you to shut it down thats 4 months of hard work down the drain.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

The reason why nobody has a storyline in a RuneScape private server is for a few different reasons. There’s reasons like lores, sub-quests, etc. already in the game. Another reason is because nobody wants to put that much depth in a private server that will most likely not get even remotely popular. Anyone that is capable of adding a proper storyline that has enough depth in it aren’t interested in RuneScape emulation at all. It would take a very long time to make a decent storyline that most people wouldn’t even bother playing through.

I believe that it would be pointless to try and add a storyline to a private server of any kind unless the MMO itself already has one.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

If there was a story line in a MMORPG like RS, people would be bored after they finish the story. Right now, people do whatever they want: skill, PK, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:14, topic:524435”]Because you can’t have a balance of interactable storyline, players, and freedom. Thought this was pretty obvious.

Plus it’s way more fun to have multiple stories.[/quote]

You can have multiple storylines and still have a main one - I think TES, Fallout and other games pull it off pretty well. But I suppose without an ever-changing world it is hard

Read full topic

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Cause most servers now a days most owners don’t know how to program correctly nor anyone is in it for the players anymore they are just in it for the money just won’t admit to it

I suppose this is true - they can make money from just hosting a PK server so why would they bother with a storyline? I think a server with a long main quest would be popular, though.

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:9, topic:524435”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=642978.msg4329388#msg4329388 date=1373454548]
They’re all sub-storylines, though, sinisoul. There isn’t a main storyline in RuneScape or any private server I’ve seen
[/quote]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=642978.msg4329321#msg4329321 date=1373434947]

Lore is very different to a storyline. A storyline would be like the “main quest” of a game like Skyrim - there is no such thing in RuneScape.
[/quote]Except there is. The storyline in RuneScape is your character and how you interact with the world. The sub storylines are the dwarf quests, the goblin quests, etc. Each one of those has their own storyline as well, revolving around your character.

a story line is a story line, you you’re looking for a single main story line then go read a book. As for private server, maybe because no one is creative enough to come up with a very complex story line that can span on so that the players don’t get bored.[/quote]

I don’t play any private servers, or RuneScape for that matter, anymore, so this isn’t something I’m personally looking for. I was just curious as to why no servers have been written with a single main storyline? (Notice how I said “a storyline” in the title instead of “many storylines”)

Read full topic
item.source: Why do no servers have a storyline?

item.title: Why do no servers have a storyline?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Ambokile:

They’re all sub-storylines, though, sinisoul. There isn’t a main storyline in RuneScape or any private server I’ve seen

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:524435”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=642978.msg4329272#msg4329272 date=1373423045]
Lore is very different to a storyline. A storyline would be like the “main quest” of a game like Skyrim - there is no such thing in RuneScape.
[/quote]Except there is. The storyline in RuneScape is your character and how you interact with the world. The sub storylines are the dwarf quests, the goblin quests, etc. Each one of those has their own storyline as well, revolving around your character.[/quote]

a story line is a story line, you you’re looking for a single main story line then go read a book. As for private server, maybe because no one is creative enough to come up with a very complex story line that can span on so that the players don’t get bored.

Read full topic
